name: cra-template-goose
author: James Giesbrecht <giesbrechtjames@gmail.com>
description: A Create React App template with React Router, Material UI, Eslint, Prettier, and Typescript with a basic layout and routes configured.

scripts.create:local: rm -rf app && yarn create react-app app --template file:.
scripts.update-dependencies: cd app && yarn add react-router-dom @mui/material @mui/icons-material @mui/styles clsx @emotion/react @emotion/styled @types/react-router-dom @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin @typescript-eslint/parser eslint eslint-config-airbnb eslint-config-prettier eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-jest eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y eslint-plugin-prettier eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks prettier
